definition: paternal aunt/husband's sister/husband's mother (old)/nun/for the time being (literary)

sentences.english: What else do you usually do with your aunt?
sentences.chinese: 你通常与你的姑母做其它什么？

sentences.english: One day, his aunt came to beg for forgiveness.
sentences.chinese: 一日，密勒日巴的姑母前来祈求原谅。

sentences.english: Uncles, aunts and cousins will come.
sentences.chinese: 叔叔，姑母和堂兄弟将要来。

sentences.english: Kitty,what do you usually do with your aunt?
sentences.chinese: 基蒂，你通常与你的姑母做什么？

sentences.english: Thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy father's sister: she is thy father's near kinswoman .
sentences.chinese: 不可露你姑母的下体，她是你父亲的骨肉之亲。

sentences.english: Her aunt scarcely looked her age.
sentences.chinese: 她的姑母几乎看不出有那么大年纪。

sentences.english: Her parents died when she was a baby and she was brought up by her aunt.
sentences.chinese: 她出生后不久父母双亡，是由姑母养大的。

sentences.english: Auntie Meg has been very brave.
She was named Ann for her aunt.
sentences.chinese: 她随姑母的名字也叫安。

sentences.english: "There, " said the Rani's aunt. "Even the bird knows."
sentences.chinese: “你看，”王妃的姑母说道，“连鸟都明白这道理。”

sentences.english: Sid was left a large sum of money by his aunt.
sentences.chinese: 锡德继承了他姑母的一大笔遗产。

sentences.english: Her aunt is making over the baby again.
sentences.chinese: 她的姑母又在与那个婴儿亲热起来了。

sentences.english: He had imbibed at Geneva the idea that one must always attentive to one's aunt.
sentences.chinese: 他在日内瓦时就有了这种想法，他一定要孝敬姑母。

sentences.english: He probably fell down in the dark and broke his leg, " Aunt Spiker said."
sentences.chinese: “他或许在暗处摔倒并且摔断了腿，”斯派克姑母说。

sentences.english: Aunt March always cleared up quickly.
sentences.chinese: 玛基姑母总是很快地讲和。

sentences.english: My straitlaced Aunt Anna doesn't approve of my miniskirts.
sentences.chinese: 我刻板的安娜姑母不喜欢我的迷你裙。

definition: wife of mother's brother/aunt/maternal uncle's wife
older male cousin via female line
older brother's wife/sister-in-law/(polite address to a younger married woman) sister
wife of paternal grandfather's younger brother
